subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0043_01CA4CED.889C8680
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Wow..some how, I missed getting a bunch of messages it appears.

To Frank -=
 don't shoot the messenger. Just sayin'

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: Rj 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 200=
9 4:13 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!


    Other tha=
n various claims, there is no evidence that anything will happen in  2012: =
it will be the same as every other end-of-world prediction made before.

  =
      Then someone will "recalculate", or proclaim a new EVP message, and p=
oint at 2013!  Or 2014!  

        However, I really do like it when people=
 pick specific dates for predictions.  Besides being entertaining, it gives=
 everyone a chance to judge for themselves just how much the predictor is l=
ike all the others who have marched around carrying  those "THE END OF THE =
WORLD IS NIGH" signs.  Full of nothing but themselves and their  delusions.=


        --- On Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...=
m> wrote:


          From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...>
 =
         Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
          To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesday, October 14, 2009, 2:59 PM


    =
        
          And you can expect the debunking to escalate, but go ahe=
ad--everyone knows the media always tells the truth. 
          Trillions o=
f $$$ are missing, and some suspect it's been used to build secret bunkers =
for the elite to ride out the shift in, and you think they are not going to=
 spend a bit more on dis-information to keep panicked hords from over runni=
ng their hidy holes. 

          These same sources you quote will also tel=
l you there are no sprits, hence no EVP, yet you don't believe that. 

    =
      Besides, it is not just the Mayans, every freaking culture in the wor=
ld has the exact same predictions- the exact same date-just coincidence no =
doubt! You expect some bozo that has as much in common with mayan calendar =
creators as I have with the man in the moon to know anything at all about i=
t. I can go and on...Experts all and everyone has an opinion that is gospel=
 and unquestionable. You can find any information you want to hear, whether=
 it's EVP or 2012.

          You better take a closer look at your world, =
if nothing happens to change this crap hole, the future is extrememly bleak=
-- a slow rotting death that goes on for milenia. 

          F-S


       =
